body:
py-pyqt5 throws error during config phase as shown below. After adding py-enum34 as dependency, package installs.
```
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> [2019-07-31-01:05:18.779318] '/disk/software/lib/hpcpm/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-9.1.0/python-2.7.16-7zsnkcaqnii7p5exfgiobrjnyo
fv3wrf/bin/python2.7' 'configure.py' '--pyuic5-interpreter' '/disk/software/lib/hpcpm/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-9.1.0/python-2.7.16
-7zsnkcaqnii7p5exfgiobrjnyofv3wrf/bin/python2.7' '--verbose' '--confirm-license' '--qmake' '/disk/software/lib/hpcpm/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7
-x86_64/gcc-9.1.0/qt-5.11.3-zc3mvpbz5oyqoobxgziuaxy3jzpobbbj/bin/qmake' '--sip' '/disk/software/lib/hpcpm/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc
-9.1.0/py-sip-4.19.18-zj3mdnzwkow6gurjjj2uekqots3jf5h2/bin/sip' '--sip-incdir' '/disk/software/lib/hpcpm/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-
9.1.0/py-sip-4.19.18-zj3mdnzwkow6gurjjj2uekqots3jf5h2/include/python2.7' '--bindir' '/disk/software/lib/hpcpm/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64
/gcc-9.1.0/py-pyqt5-5.13.0-4am7wk5li33izrnaqxtvessl7hj3d375/bin' '--destdir' '/disk/software/lib/hpcpm/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-9.
1.0/py-pyqt5-5.13.0-4am7wk5li33izrnaqxtvessl7hj3d375/lib/python2.7/site-packages'
Error: Unable to import enum. Please install the enum34 package from PyPI.
Querying qmake about your Qt installation...
```
title: py-pyqt5 missing dependency
